eu_initiatives:
- in detail : legislation on PPE, both product legislation (Directive 89/686 replaced by Regulation 2016/425 as of 21/04/2018) and use legislation (Directive 89/656) 
- currently main focus on implementation of and transition to the new PPE Regulation 2016/425 assisting our members with practical information 
- more general : legislation on Occupational Health and Safety and legislation related to internal market
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership:
ESF is a member of FAIB 
ESF is a partner of the EU-OSHA agency for their campaigns on occupational health and safety 
ESF is an active stakeholder in meetings of the EU commission (DG GROW - PPE directive) 
ESF is an active partner of the Coordination of the Notified Bodies in the field of PPE 
ESF is active within CEN-CENELEC standardisation (e.g. Secretary General is chair of the PPE sector forum) 
ESF works together with organisations such as ETSA, EURATEX, CEFIC, ESIG, FESI, ANEC, BUSINESS EUROPE, ... on specific issues
relevant_communication:
- implementation of PPE legislation (e.g. as member of the PPE working group at DG GROW) 
- information material (e.g. Q&A on our website) and sessions/workshops for members on legislation and its implementation (transition to new PPE product legislation and impact on economic operators) 
- (co-)organiser of seminars/conferences on PPE
goals__remit:
our mission : 
•to promote health and safety management and culture in the workplace and enhance health and safety awareness along the whole value chain from prevention to protection 
•to gain a hearing in legislation, implementation, market surveillance and standardisation mainly in the field of PPE taking into account sustainability. 
•to harmonise actions in the European countries by close cooperation between national and European level
